extension.name: AS 002051 Free - Virtue Mart
extension.author: AS Designing
extension.description:
AS Template 002051 Free
VirtueMart 2 Template for Joomla! 2.5

Click here to see the template documentation.
Visit our site for more templates: http://www.astemplates.com.

Free Version is limited and may not include all configuration parameters.

Extensions used in this template:

VirtueMart Component 2.0.26d
AS Nivo Slider
AS Moo Slider
AS Menu Accordion
Phoca gallery
Google map plugin

Most popular AS Templates:

AS Template 002022
AS Template 002036
AS Template 002035
AS Template 002044
AS Template 002056

field.label: The saving process may take a few seconds

field.name: slider_width
field.label: Slider width (px)
field.description: Enter a slider width in pixels if the slider is not going to be used in the full size and there is published modules position 7 or position 8. Default value for full size is 0(zero)

field.name: body_bgpattern
field.label: Background pattern
field.description: Background pattern, the image have to be uploaded using the Joomla! Media Manager

field.name: body_bgpositioning
field.label: Background pattern positioning
field.description: Background pattern positioning (doesn't work with full size screen repeating)

field.name: body_bgoverlay
field.label: Overlay image
field.description: Overlay image, the image have to be uploaded using the Joomla! Media Manager

field.name: body_hfontfamily
field.label: Heading font family
field.description: Select your favorite font-family here for the heading, main menu, buttons, company name, slogan and position 6.
field.option: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif

field.name: body_hbgimg
field.label: Heading background pattern
field.description: Select a background image from the media folder.

field.name: body_hfontcolor
field.label: Heading font color (H1-H3)
field.description: Heading font color, for H1, H2 and H3 only

field.name: body_hshadowcolor
field.label: Heading shadow color (H1-H3)
field.description: Heading shadow color, HTML5 only, for H1, H2 and H3 only

field.name: body_fontfamily
field.label: Content font family
field.option: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif

field.name: btn_bgpattern
field.label: Button background pattern
field.description: Select a button background pattern from the media folder

field.name: box_bordercolor
field.label: Heading/boxes border color
field.description: Heading border color for positions: 0, 20-23, 32-35, 40-42 and 45-47. Boxes border color for positions: 1, 7, 12-15, 25, 28-31, 43, 44, 48, 49, 56-59, footer and slider.

field.name: box_borderradius
field.label: * Heading/boxes border radius
field.description: HTML5 only. Heading border radius for positions: 0, 20-23, 32-35, 40-42 and 45-47. Boxes border radius for positions: 1, 7, 12-15, 25, 28-31, 43, 44, 48, 49, 56-59, footer and slider.

field.name: box_shadow
field.label: * Heading/boxes shadow
field.description: HTML5 only. Heading shadow for positions: 0, 20-23, 32-35, 40-42 and 45-47. Boxes shadow for positions: 1, 7, 12-15, 25, 28-31, 43, 44, 48, 49, 56-59, footer and slider.

field.name: box_shadowcolor
field.label: * Heading/boxes shadow color
field.description: HTML5 only. Heading shadow color for positions: 0, 20-23, 32-35, 40-42 and 45-47. Boxes shadow color for positions: 1, 7, 12-15, 25, 28-31, 43, 44, 48, 49, 56-59, footer and slider.

field.name: jQuery_load
field.label: jQuery load
field.description: Option to load jquery script into site

field.name: header_showoverlayimg
field.label: Show overlay image
field.description: Show or not the header overlay image

field.name: header_overlayimg
field.label: Overlay image
field.description: Overlay image, the image have to be uploaded using the Joomla! Media Manager

field.name: logo_type
field.label: Logo type
field.description: Here you can choose if a Logo should be shown as Image or Text

field.name: logo_img
field.label: Logo image home
field.description: Select a Logo for the home page from the media folder

field.name: logo_txt
field.label: Logo text
field.description: Enter a Text that will be shown in the Company Logo place

field.name: slogan_txt
field.label: Slogan text
field.description: Enter a Text that will be shown in the Company Slogan place

field.label: Background pattern
field.description: Select a background image from the media folder.

field.name: topmenu_shadowcolor

field.description: Menu shadow font color, HTML5 only

field.label: Background pattern

field.description: Heading text shadow color, HTML5 only
